What is crowdfunding?

"Using the internet to run a fundraising campaign. To thank them for their support, students can offer perks to their funders."

How to apply

StudentFunder offer loans and crowdfunding for professional and postgraduate courses provided by UK institutions. To apply, you must hold an offer letter or be already enrolled. Funds are limited and allocated on a first-come, first-served basis so make sure you apply as early as possible.

You will need to apply online and if your application is successful, you will be invited for a Skype interview.

Find out more at the StudentFunder official website.
